title: Spinder App
description: In a team of four, we created a music discovery app based on your top songs on Spotify. You were recommended new songs to listen to and save to your library by swiping left or right.

title: This website!
description: Inspired by 1980s arcades but with a modern twist. Single-handedly designed and created with a mobile-first approach using React and ThreeJS. An excuse to have a domain of my own :D

title: Old website
description: Inspired by Samsung's 2001 T-120 cassette tape cover! Created completely in Javascript with the ThreeJS library. It doesn't work anymore :( but it looks super cool!

title: ChatGPTwo
description: Created using Python and OpenAI's GPT-3.5 Turbo model, you can create your own, personal A.I. chatbot! I created it so I could use it when ChatGPT was at capacity.

title: SnippIt
description: A very simple Python terminal app that allows you to snip certain sections of a song. You can also download full songs for free, but please don't get me in trouble :)
